articles.title: The magic of African on AMVCA black carpet - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: With the level of publicity and media hype deployed this year, the massive turnout of guests at the 2022 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards (AMVCA) was expected.

articles.author: Prinesha Naidoo
articles.title: R24bn fund launched to wean Africa off Russian wheat - News24
articles.description: Africa’s biggest multilateral lender announced a $1.5billion (R24 billion) fund to boost grain production to help avert potential food shortages stemming from Russia’s war with Ukraine.
